forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. West northwest wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the evening air is crisp and carries a hint of the ocean, a precursor to the night ahead. Tonight, the skies are mostly clear, creating a tranquil backdrop for nocturnal adventures as temperatures hover around a mild 49 degrees. A gentle west-northwest breeze adds a refreshing chill, inviting you to snuggle into a light sweater or perhaps a cozy scarf. 

Looking ahead to Tuesday, bright sunshine will cascade down upon the city, casting vivid shadows across the urban landscape. The high will flirt with 58 degrees, lingering just around 55 in the afternoon as the heat succumbs to the cool embrace of the familiar bay winds. Expect an invigorating day, perfect for a leisurely stroll through the parks or perhaps a visit to a cozy café where one can sip a warm beverage while basking in the soft light and watching the world pass by. The absence of fog tonight suggests that the marine layer may hold back, offering a panorama of clarity for those who venture out. Engaging with the city’s charm feels particularly appealing, whether it’s an artful wander or simply savoring the moments in this invigorating weather.
